title: (x) Gothic "In Dark Decorum" banner - Morpheus (similar to Mason) {Isaac, Mike Y, Mike F}
author: hotpixel

comments.content: I think it strongly resembles [Mason Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054657/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PMasSeR.html) from Emigr�, but there are differences. I think this is a freeware imitator, whose name I can't recall.

Kiwi Media's [Morpheus](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054657/http:/www.kiwi-media.com/fonts.html) has been around for nearly a decade.   
It's well known and put to use by lots of amateurs (only) and   
I seriously doubt that Emigre has ever felt threatened by it.

Oh, it certainly does such ripping off, Yves. All wrong. Should never   
have been made. Bad font (I honestly mean this).   
   
That said, it is prolifically used, but have you _ever_ seen it used in a   
non-amateur (read: paying-for-fonts) application. I haven't. Ergo, my   
Emigre non-issue stance. Ergo, why make it an issue here?   
   
By the way, who was that Mike **E** credited with the ID in [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054657/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68615.html?1112740084).

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054657im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif).   
   
I do know you're pressed for time.   
And that I can definitely relate to.   
Thanks,Yves.

wow ppl really thx   
very usefull information and very fast, i think i use Mason for my proyect.   
=)
